page.title: 18LEISURE - CHILDRENS
page.content: 'I spend most of my time playing outside or watching T.V.'Pamela aged 10. 'We've got a computer but I don't play with it much now' Paul aged 10 'Computer games are boring,except for the new ones ' Jason aged 8 'If we start to play a game some of the older lads come and spoil it they take the ball away' Robert aged 9 'On a night some of my friends come to my house and we listen to records ' Julie aged 10 'Most of the time I'm bored' Craig aged 8 'I have to help my mam a lot at home' Wendy aged 10 'I've got a video and a telly in my bedroom so I can watch anything I want' Robert aged 9
